data.name: punke racing
data.detailed_description:
“Punk racing” is a casual fun racing game launched by YOUSOI.Unlike other racing games, there is a mysterious creature in the game. It's called a costo, and it's on a mission to cross dangerous valleys. It had to rely on its own bravery and a magical race car to cross the valley.
Dangerous valley track, thrilling racing process;
Novel gameplay, 3D all-round perspective effect brings you immersive game experience;
Unique game painting style, full of fun and challenges;
Be a silly tightrope head, ride punk and rock, ride a bumpy road to the finish line.
data.about_the_game:

Novel gameplay, 3D all-round perspective effect brings you immersive game experience;

Be a silly tightrope head, ride punk and rock, ride a bumpy road to the finish line.
data.short_description: Valley circuit surrounded by danger, thrilling racing process,Novel gameplay, 3D all-round perspective effect brings you immersive game experience,Unique game style, full of fun and challenges.Avatar silly wire head, sit punk singing rock, bumpy mountain road, to the end of it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/AMD Radeon rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
